name: XppAddLicenseToPackage
description: Task to add license files to a deployable package for Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: Review the Dynamics 365 for Finance and Operations [Developer Documentation](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2128832).

inputs.name: PackageType
inputs.label: Package Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of package to which license needs to be added

inputs.name: ModelName
inputs.label: Model Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the model in which the license file(s) are to be added. Each model will need a separate task. Ignored if Lifecycle Services Deployable Package is used.

inputs.name: LicenseFilePaths
inputs.label: Search pattern for license file to add to the package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search pattern for the license files to include. Wildcards can be used, or a list of license files by specifying one file path per line.

inputs.name: DeployablePackagePath
inputs.label: Filename and path of the deployable package to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path including filename for the existing deployable package
